column3: Main GUPRI (i.e. PID) under which all terms are defined. Preference is to use PURLs or W3IDs as they provide permanent resolvable identifiers if they are properly configured and managed.

column1: Prefixes for controlled vocabularies, schema and ontologies

column4: Prefix for our controlled vocabulary since it is rather tedious to write long URLs all the time
Prefix for SKOS Onotlogy is which our base for defining SKOS based controlled vocabulary
Prefix for Provenance, Authoring and Versioning Onotlogy which properties such as version and createdOn we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary
Prefix for Dublin Core (Terms) Ontology which properties such as title, description, rights, source, etc. we will use to describe our controlled vocabulary as well to define its terms

column2: A classification of wind turbine materials

column3: An ORCID ID of the vocabulary creator
License under which the vocabulary is provided
Date when vocabulary was initially created
Date of the last vocabulary update

column4: A collection of terms related to materials used for the wind turbine blade production.
A collection of terms related to materials used for the wind tower production.
A collection of terms related to materials used for the wind turbine drivetrain production.
A collection of terms related to materials used for the wind turbine transformer and industor production.
